text: It was Ok I Loved the Movie, But Number 1, 2 & 3 Were kinda more cinema..But it was fine
ITS THE BOOK O THE LIFE PO,S A WRIT-IN(music in backround)

This movie was the weakest of the franchise. But I still enjoyed it quite a bit. The positives: the plot was fine, Jack Black and Akwafina did great voice acting and humour. Their chemistry was pretty good. The villain had an interest concept and design. The movie was less funny than others but still got me a couple of laughs, the battles were fun and entertaining. The animation and visuals always gorgeous and beautiful. The return of villains were fine but mostly Tai Lung was the best and his redemption arc. I also liked the dad stuffs. The negatives: Its the weakest of the franchise, the villain was a good premise but not executed really well and her motivations are kind of lazy and stupid. The lack of the furious 5 didn't annoy me too much but I still wished to see them more than just in the post credits scene and the pacing was a bit off. In conclusion, this movie is the weakest of the franchise. But still fun and entertaining to watch alone or with family and don't have too high expectations.
Like Despicable Me 4, Kung Fu Panda 4 was not needed. It is however a good movie. I thought the villain was cool but the story was a bit predictable. It was also action packed and funny.
This movie ruined the legacy of the rest of the series. What an insult to the hard work put into the rest of this story. They really just used the IP to make a quick buck and it sucks.

Está película no está a la altura de las 3 anteriores, una villana muy buena que nerfearon de una manera inexplicable, era más poderosa que todos los villanos anteriores y la vencieron muy rapido.

Lo de Zhen como nuevo guerrero dragón se siente muy forzado y muy parecido a Cars 3, no se siente merecido, Tigresa lo merecía mucho más.
Aparte la historia tiene muchos huecos como que aparece Kai siendo que en la película pasada Po lo mató cuando el ya era un espíritu o el mismo problema con la villana, que la derrotan muy fácil.

La ausencia de los 5 furiosos no se explica, Po no tiene para que buscar ayuda y buscar otro ejército si los 5 siempre lo han ayudado en todo, además deberían estar presentes en el final de su viaje, que aparezcan al final no cuenta porque no dicen ni una sola frase.

Lo destacable de esta película es la animación, las peleas y muchos planos de la película se ven muy bien, Po igualmente tuvo un desarrollo y aprendió a aceptar el cambio y comenzar algo nuevo. La canción de los créditos también es de lo mejor de esta película

Filme fraco, o roteiro é fraco, as cenas são fracas, a história é fraca, o elenco é fraco, e ninguém ajuda a melhorar o filme, os personagens são fracos, e o filme deveria ter cenas bem melhores e relevantes, para fazer o filme ser bom
Bad New Characters, Terrible Villain, Simple Humor, No Emotional Depth, Terrible New Cast, No Furious Five (dumbest reason of no returning), I can just go on.
Fun in parts, but definitely not the strongest of the series. The humor still works, yet the story feels a bit stretched.
It’s the worst of the series, but it has a little to offer and Jack Black is a great singer

Not worth it!
Although the animation is good, the story doesn't feel like Kung Fu Panda, the Furious Five are not in it, the villain is bland and Jack Black felt like he didn't want to do this film.

Decent movie but doesn't have a memorable villain. This is the most forgettable of the series but still has the same charm because of Po. There is a lot more that could have been done. I noticed a difference in the pacing of the movie making it feel rushed. The excluded furious five gives me this feeling.

um completo lixo,segundo pior filme que já assisti na minha vida,só ficando abaixo de coringa 2,hístoria preguiçosa e sem graça nenhuma,desrespeito com os cinco furiosos,e além disso o filme é chato,nota 0

I don’t ever leave reviews but I had to. This movie might be the worst i’ve seen. Plot feels super forced and it is extremely corny. Also the moral compass in this movie doesn’t make any sense. Po spent the last 3 movies fighting criminals and now he’s fighting with a criminal. Literally fighting innocent people who were cheated their money in a game. 😭
Kung fu panda simply cannot miss even if this isn't as good as the others it's still a hit!

First of all... the first Kung Fu Panda is the only good one, and it's the only one I even acknowledge. But if Awkwafina is the heir to this franchise, then it might be time to hang it up. It wasn't bad, though. Good babysitting fare.
It is a great movie. This movie has action and comedy. Skadoosh!!!

Exactly what I expected from the fourth installment.  I thoroughly enjoyed it and thought they gave a fitting close to the series.  And, for the record, Jack Black rocked that Brittney Spears song for the closing credits.
Horrible movie. I can’t believe so many bots are rating it anything above 1 star.

It was an ok movie it’s pretty cringy I liked the first one and second one but the third and fourth one just got overboard they shouldve stopped at the third one tbh it shows how he finally Mets his dad and thay shouldve been the end the fourth one just so random like wasnt po just the dragon warrior a few years ago why he have to pick another one when the turtle was for years (I don’t remember much abt the lore)
